meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by red, raised, itchy welts
meanings.sent1: She developed urticaria after coming into contact with a plant.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her urticaria as an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: The urticaria on her arm made her feel like a human dot-to-dot puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The urticaria spread across her skin like a fiery map of discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The itching and burning of urticaria felt like tiny volcanoes erupting on her skin.

meanings.sent1: He went to the dermatologist to get treatment for his urticaria.
meanings.sent2: The nurse explained that urticaria is another word for hives.
meanings.sent3: The urticaria diagnosis gave him a reason to avoid eating shellfish.
meanings.sent4: Her urticaria was like a secret code her body was trying to decipher.
meanings.sent5: The sudden appearance of urticaria was like a surprise party thrown by his immune system.
